title: Tojin Okichi (Mistress Of A Foreigner)-1930-Kenji Mizoguchi.avi
description:
[b]This is a fragment from the film. It consists of a formal dance, accompanied by the soundtrack.[/b]


Mistress Of A Foreigner is a 1930 film adaptation of the best-selling novel written by Yagisaburo Juichi. There is a myth that Kenji Mizoguchi was really into making the film and tried to cut down a telephone pole that was getting in the way of the cameras.
